main.name: Lev Faiger
main.occupation: Full-stack web developer using ReactJs, Javascript ES5, ES6  and  .Net 4.6
main.description: Developing non-standard super rich web applications using sophisticated client technics.   Solving complex business problems using self-designed algorithms on server side.
main.subDescription: (It's better to read this web page when you press PLAY button)
main.bio: Client side: Rich GUI needed to be built. The forms are programmed like collections of components for easy reuse and maintenance. By  react, pure javascript classes.Server side: Developing complicated algorithms for hotel industry. Price management algorithms. Transfer data in real time to different external chanels like Booking.com , Airbnb, Expidea. Algorithms are coded by C# based on different designed patterns . Processes were needed to be very time efficient. Big amount of data is needed to be proccessed

projects.title: Silverbyte, Property Management System

itemsproject.title: Build WEB API SERVICES for hotel management of: PRICE OF THE ROOM , YIELD BY DATES, AVAILIBILITY, CALENDAR OF RESERVARTIONS, MAINTAINACE OF THE ROOM IN HOTEL, INVENTORY

projects.projectDescription: Developing Hotel Property Management System. The system used for reservation, availability and occupancy management, check-in/out, images, guest profiles, report generation etc. This application is used in-house (in an individual hotel) to control the onsite property activities.The system is installed in 90% of Israel hotels. As also in hotel of Germany,Holland,UK and others countires

projects.projectDescription: Developing a tool that will allow you to sell all your rooms on all your connected booking sites (like Booking.com ,Expedia, AirBNB ) at the same time. It will automatically update your availability in real-time on all sites when a booking is made, when you close a room to sale, or when you want to make bulk changes to your inventory

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
